actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend title XVI of the Social Security Act to provide for an exclusion from resources of an amount deposited as prepayment of funeral and burial expenses.

summary.text: Provides that up to $1000 of an amount deposited as prepayment of funeral and burial expenses shall be excluded from financial resources in determining eligibility for State grants to the aged, blind, and disabled under the Social Security Act.

titles.title: A bill to amend title XVI of the Social Security Act to provide for an exclusion from resources of an amount deposited as prepayment of funeral and burial expenses.
